verses.verse: <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> a <S%H1121>year;<s%> and when he had <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> for himself <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> of which two <S%H505>thousand<s%> were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> and in the <S%H2022>Mount<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and one <S%H505>thousand<s%> were with <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

<S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that was in <S%H1387>Geba:<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H7586>it.<s%> Saul <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H8085>hear!<s%>"

All <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and also that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was had in <S%H887>abomination<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> assembled themselves <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H5971>people<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is on the <S%H3220>seashore<s%> <S%H8193><s%> in <S%H7230>multitude:<s%> and they came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> <S%H6926>eastward<s%> of Beth <S%H1007>Aven.<s%>

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were in a <S%H6887>strait<s%> (for the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed<s%>), then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves in <S%H4631>caves,<s%> and in <S%H2337>thickets,<s%> and in <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> and in <S%H6877>coverts,<s%> and in <S%H953>pits.<s%>

Now some of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> had gone <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%> but as for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> he was yet in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> him <S%H2729>trembling.<s%>

He <S%H3176>stayed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H4150>time<s%> set by <S%H8050>Samuel:<s%> but <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H935>didn't<s%> come to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were scattered from <S%H6327>him.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Bring <S%H5066>here<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H8002>me,<s%> and the peace offerings." He <S%H5927>offered<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

It came to pass that as soon as he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5927>offering,<s%> <S%H8050>behold,<s%> Samuel <S%H935>came;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1288>him,<s%> that he might greet him.

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What have you <S%H6213>done?<s%>" <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5310>scattered<s%> from <S%H935>me,<s%> and that you didn't come within the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4150>appointed,<s%> and that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> assembled themselves <S%H622>together<s%> at <S%H4363>Michmash;<s%>

therefore I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6430><s%> 'Now the Philistines will come <S%H3381>down<s%> on me to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and I <S%H2470>haven't<s%> entreated the favor <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>' I <S%H662>forced<s%> myself <S%H5927>therefore,<s%> and offered the burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "You have done <S%H5528>foolishly.<s%> You have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3068>you;<s%> for now Yahweh would have <S%H3559>established<s%> your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> on <S%H3478%H99999>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

But now your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall not <S%H6965>continue.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1245>sought<s%> for himself a <S%H376>man<s%> after his own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>appointed<s%> him to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over his <S%H5971>people,<s%> because you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> that which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> with <S%H8337>him,<s%> about six <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> with <S%H3427>them,<s%> stayed in <S%H1387>Geba<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> but the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash.<s%>

The <S%H7843>spoilers<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> to the <S%H1870>way<s%> that leads to <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7777>Shual;<s%>

and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to Beth <S%H1032>Horon;<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> that <S%H8259>looks<s%> down on the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H6650>Zeboim<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Now there was no <S%H2796>smith<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Lest the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H2719>swords<s%> or <S%H2595>spears;<s%>"

but all the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to <S%H3913>sharpen<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4282>plowshare,<s%> <S%H4281>mattock,<s%> <S%H7134>axe,<s%> and <S%H855>sickle;<s%>

yet they had a <S%H6477>file<s%> for the <S%H4281>mattocks,<s%> and for the <S%H855>plowshares,<s%> and for the <S%H7969>forks,<s%> and for the <S%H7134>axes,<s%> and to <S%H5324>set<s%> the <S%H1861>goads.<s%>

So it came to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that there was neither <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of any of the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan:<s%> but with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and with <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was there <S%H4672>found.<s%>
The <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4569>pass<s%> of <S%H4363>Michmash.<s%>
